message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take a slightly bigger share this time
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much, let's see if you'll take it!
You're getting greedy, I'll take a bigger share this time, but I'll give you a chance to accept
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're running out of options, I'll take a huge share this time, you can't afford to say no
I'll give you a small chance to redeem yourself, but don't think you're getting off easy!
